subject: Pedal Load Cell Simsonn Pro Plus P2 P
description_text:
Hi support, I recently purchased your Pedal Load Cell Simsonn Pro Plus P2
P. I am looking for the installation instructions and tutorial videos to
help with the setup.

The link provided in the manual from your website for the "Pedal Load Cell
Simsonn Pro Plus P2 P" did not work. Could you please provide me with
working links to the installation manual and any available video guides for
this model


Thanks,
Bruno Henrique
PoolTile.ca <http://pooltile.ca/>
800-866-0695

conversations.body_text: Hi，Bruno Henrique，     You can refer to the corresponding page on our website and check the PlusX user manual. Its structure and usage are very similar to the Pro Plus, making it a useful reference.   https://www.simsonn.com/pages/simsonn-product-manuals
